Chris Evangelista

Make a Joyful Noise!

About Me

My name is Chris and I am an administrative and communications professional with years of experience in the non-profit sector. I have demonstrated leadership, administrative, and technical skills, as well as proficiency in publishing software such as Adobe InDesign & PhotoShop CC, Microsoft Office, and Apple Pages/Numbers/Keynote.

My Top 5 Interests

  1. Reading Books
  2. Playing the Piano & Ukulele
  3. Playing video games on my iPad
  4. Studying Languages
  5. Watching Funny YouTube videos

My Education
  • TEFL Full Circle, Online — TEFL/TEYL Certificate, 2019
  • Wycliffe College, Toronto, ON — Master of Theological Studies, 2015
  • University of Toronto, Toronto, ON — Honours Bachelor of Art (History), 2010
  • W.A. Porter CI, Toronto, ON - Ontario Secondary School Diploma, 2003
